attributes.review: I would give this zero stars if i could but that unfortunately is not an option 🥰. I downloaded this because i was genuinely interested, but the app kept crashing (how weird)! When I finally got the app to work I began to get suicidal thoughts. The quality of the app is TERRIBLE. That’s why! Nothing loads. DO NOT GET THIS APP😖😫😩🤬
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: I was very excited to keep up with campaign of the “best president ever” but it took 63 days just to download. Once it downloaded it took 47 days just to get off the loading screen to actually use the app. After that I realized this is the worst app ever especially because it supports the worst president ever.
attributes.title: Worst App Ever

attributes.review:
so when i first saw this app i HAD to download , cuz like we gotta love our spray tanned, racist, homophobic, sexist president who also is a rapist 🥰

so when i got the app, i opened it and there was a giant trump face floating on the screen! then i clicked on it and i heard a knock on my door 😳🤢

it was the fbi with TRUMP at my doorstep!! i cried and ran away but he chased me and then said i should die!! 😱

then he killed my dog and i hit him with a pride flag 🏳️‍🌈and he ran away!! 🤭🥳

but as he jumped in his orange car, HE DROPPED HIS SPRAY TAN BOTTLE 😏🤪😱

it was called “summer orange ” 🍊 👍

now we all are able to have his orange glow 🙌
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP DO NOT DOWNLOAD 🤮👺

attributes.review: this app took so long to download i was just trying to support the racist homophobic prejudice president that we have here. ya know trying to be all patriotic but it's been two days and it's still not downloading and to fill my time i've been on tik tok but this Chetoo dust looking man is taking that away
attributes.title: not worth your time

attributes.review: I downloaded this app earlier today thinking it would be helpful but in all honesty i could not have made a worse decision. As soon as I downloaded it and opened it all of my other apps stopped working. Not to mention the app itself was just terrible and not worth using at all!!
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support our great president donald dump truck but it took 98 weeks to load? Also whenever I opened the app a high pitched buzzing sound would play? Oh and after I downloaded it my fridge broke down so it must be the apps fault too. Don’t waste your time on this app. No ❤️.
attributes.title: Absolutely horrible!!

attributes.review: President trump isn’t even on this app, it’s just his constituents 😤. Every notification, on this app, that I have received has been irrelevant and stupid. I do not care when his kids birthday’s are no matter how many times this app reminds me. This is such a useless app and I don’t think anyone should use it.
attributes.title: FAKE NEWS

attributes.review: I seriously cannot believe this is on the App Store still. It took several days to download, had fourteen different languages on the screen at one time that no one could understand, and for some odd reason it kept spamming me with orange trump stickers. Terrible app would NOT recommend. 0/10
attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE!!!

attributes.review:
After the app had downloaded and I was to the point were I put my mobile number in I got an email from the app with a link that sent me to a porn video of a man kidnapping and using a black girl as a toy 
how dare you send an show that to people this is just disgusting 😡😡
attributes.title: I have no words😡🤬

attributes.review: The app took a a full day to download, once it finally did it didn’t let me sign in. Then it started to give me a lot of spam calls about voting for Trump. It would let me use any other app, and in my email spammed Trump 2020 things. In all I completely do not recommend having this app.
